entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Suffield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:34 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
